func sumAndFormat(nums []int, label string, includeDetail bool) (int, string, error) {
	var sum int
	var sb strings.Builder
	for _, n := range nums {
		if n > 0 {
			sum += n
			if includeDetail {
				sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("%d,", n))
			}
		} else if n < 0 {
			sum += -n
			if includeDetail {
				sb.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("(%d),", n))
			}
		}
	}
	if sum == 0 {
		return 0, "", fmt.Errorf("empty result for %s", label)
	}
	s := sb.String()
	if label != "" {
		s = label + ": " + s
	}
	return sum, s, nil
}
